root.mailSubject: OA ADMIN Super admin approval with Id - <%userId%> is crated
root.mailContent:
Dear User,
We are pleased to notify that transaction under our reference number <%userId%> has been processed.
Details of the transaction are available in the attached advice(s). Kindly note that the attachments are password protected. To open the attachment, kindly enter your 6 / 8 digit Customer ID. This e-mail is for your information and does not require a response.
If you wish to contact us, please e-mail us at xxxx or call XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX within UAE or XXXXXXXXXXXXX from outside UAE.
Sincerely, OA Admin Department www.OA-ADMIN.com
